title: Validation and Application Strategies for Cognitive Load Theory-Based Assessment Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A research project where professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields validate the French-translated cognitive load scale’s validity. Uses personal devices for online surveys and data analysis.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the three components of Cognitive Load Theory (Intrinsic, Extraneous, Germane) to real educational cases.
Learners can explain methods to evaluate the reliability and validity of a French translation cognitive load scale.
Learners can interpret research data (factor analysis, learning outcome correlations) and compile them into a report.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
